title: Urgot needs a Visual Update!
body:
Though Urgot is already a sexy beast, and he makes spider legs on a fat man look great, I feel as if he needs an update.  His kit is great (maybe a bit of extra mana would balance him) but his overall look might needs some work.
Thanks,
-BrodeRage
{{champion:6}} :D:D:D;D:D

replies.body: Urgot has been slated for a Sion level rework.
No, that would be Yorick. I'm pretty sure Urgot is getting a gameplay/remodel rework, not a full on rework (His lore and character design will still be the same/very similar.
Urgot was confirmed many times for Sion level rework, Yorick has been on and off the table and is further away than Urgot, but is also still a Sion level rework.
You don't say... He's on the list for reworks, probably going to be after Poppy's rework.
